snippet: Conor Murphy was a stablehand in England when he won $1.5 million on a $75 bet. It was a life-changing event, but not everything is different.
abstract: Conor Murphy was a stablehand in England when he won $1.5 million on a $75 bet; he now lives in Kentucky, training horses for some of the most prominent figures in racing; he will be at the Kentucky Derby, rooting for Lines of Battle, horse owned by one of his clients.
lead_paragraph: Conor Murphy was a stablehand in England when he won $1.5 million on a $75 bet. It was a life-changing event, but not everything is different.

headline.seo: One Bet Turns a Stablehand Into a Stable Owner
headline.main: With One Bet, Stablehand Becomes Stable Owner
headline.print_headline: With One Bet, Stablehand Becomes Stable Owner
